character.name: Dave
description: A gambler. His cards have <c=cardtrait>random effects</c> and allow him to rig the odds.

RedRigging.name: Red Rigging
RedRigging.description: The next {0} cards with Red/Black actions will go Red.

BlackRigging.name: Black Rigging
BlackRigging.description: The next {0} cards with Red/Black actions will go Black.

RedBias.name: Red Bias
RedBias.description: Each stack of this makes Red/Black actions 10% more likely to roll Red.

BlackBias.name: Black Bias
BlackBias.description: Each stack of this makes Red/Black actions 10% more likely to roll Black.

RandomFoeMove.name: Random Foe Move
RandomFoeMove.description: Instantly move the opponent <c=boldPink>{0}</c> spaces in a random direction.

RedBlack.name: Red/Black
RedBlack.description: When played, either performs the Red or Black actions.

Chip.name: CHIP
Chip.description: This chip indicates the red/black roll result for the last card you played.

DriveRefund.name: DRIVE REFUND
DriveRefund.description: The first time you lose <c=status>overdrive</c> each turn, draw a card.

Ashtray.name: ASHTRAY
Ashtray.description: Every 5 non-Dave cards you play, add a Perfect Odds to your hand.

Roulette.name: ROULETTE
Roulette.description: Every 3 red/black cards you play with no Rigging, add a Perfect Odds to your hand.

UnderdriveGenerator.name: UNDERDRIVE GENERATOR
UnderdriveGenerator.description: Every 3 red/Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=downside>Gain -1 <c=status>overdrive</c> every 2 turns</c>.

RiggedDice.name: RIGGED DICE
RiggedDice.description: Every other turn, add a Perfect Odds to your hand.

Dizzy.name: SAFE BET SHIELD
Dizzy.description: Whenever you lose <c=status>Shield</c> or <c=hurt>Hull</c> from playing a card, gain 1 <c=status>Temp Shield</c>.

Riggs.name: ARROW SIGN
Riggs.description: All random movement is increased by 1.

Peri.name: OVERDRIVE INSURANCE
Peri.description: While you have negative <c=status>Overdrive</c>, <c=peri>Peri</c>'s and <c=98FB98>Dave</c>'s cards deal +1 damage.

Isaac.name: SPADE MODULE
Isaac.description: Whenever you play a card that deploys a midrow object, Black: Gain a <c=status>Bubble</c> first.

Drake.name: HOT STREAK
Drake.description: Whenever your <c=status>Heat</c> is increased to 3, gain 1 <c=status>Red Rigging</c> and 1 <c=status>Black Rigging</c>.

Max.name: FOIL CARD
Max.description: The first time each combat you end your turn with any <c=status>Rigging</c>, gain 1 <c=status>Red Rigging</c> and 1 <c=status>Black Rigging</c>.

Books.name: COLORED SHARDS
Books.description: When you play a card and have no <c=status>Rigging</c>, spend 2 <c=status>Shard</c> to make it <c=status>Dual Rigged</c>.

CAT.name: PAIR OF ACES
CAT.description: EXE cards offer half as many cards, but they summon an extra copy of that card.

Dyna.name: Red Bomb
Dyna.description: The first time each turn you fire a Charge from playing a card, Red: Deploy a copy of that Charge.

Dracula.name: Blood Money
Dracula.description: Whenever you roll Red from rolling, apply 1 Bleeding to the enemy.

Eddie.name: Red Lightbulb
Eddie.description: At the start of your turn, if you have any Red Rigging, spend 1 to gain 1 Energy.

Johnson.name: Embezzlement
Johnson.description: Whenever you end your turn with negative Overdrive, gain 1 Cheap Fix.

Soggins.name: Cracked Chip
Soggins.description: Whenever you have both Red Rigging and Black Rigging, Botch and Critical chances are tripled.
